p: HIV incidence and prevalence remain high among gay, bisexual and other men who have sex with men (MSM) in the United States (US) 1, 2, 3. Baltimore, Maryland (population 621,000 in 2010) is one of the cities with the highest HIV prevalence among MSM in the US, reaching 43% in the Centers for Disease Control's (CDC) National HIV Behavioral Surveillance (NHBS) survey conducted in 2011, and falling to 30% in 2014 3, 4. Only an estimated 40% of diagnosed HIV‚Äêpositive MSM in Baltimore were virally suppressed in 2015 (54% had a viral load test, of whom 74% were suppressed 5).
